__e: Mrs. Johnson, that was more of you than I needed to see yesterday.

I'm not any better than you, Mrs. Johnson I've just seen more.
- Me and Mrs. Fletcher have got ourselves an understanding about that.
You seem to know everybody around here, and I was wondering, well, maybe if you could tag along with me, it would be useful.

I think I've done this before, thank you, Ms. Wilson.
